price: 13. Le Messager d’Allah leur avait dit : « C’est la chamelle d’Allah, laissez-la donc s’abreuver! »
arabic: فَقَالَ لَهُمۡ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقۡيَٰهَا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: faqāla lahum rasūlu al-lahi nāqata al-lahi wasuq'yāhā
